mapper.select: SELECT p.*, first_name as n_first_name, family_name as n_family_name, money as m_value, reputation as r_value, battle as a_battle, knowledge as a_knowledge, support as a_support, energy as e_value FROM person p WHERE world_id = #{worldId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person (world_id, first_name, family_name, money, reputation, battle, knowledge, support, energy, max_energy) VALUES (#{worldId}, #{person.name.firstName}, #{person.name.familyName}, #{person.money.value}, #{person.reputation.value}, #{person.attributes.battle}, #{person.attributes.knowledge}, #{person.attributes.support}, #{person.energy.value}, #{person.maxEnergy})
